code: import React from"react";import{createTheme}from"@mui/material/styles";const arcBlue="#0B72B9";const arcOrange="#FFBA60";const arcGrey="#868686";const theme=createTheme({palette:{common:{blue:"".concat(arcBlue),orange:"".concat(arcOrange)},primary:{main:"".concat(arcBlue)},secondary:{main:"".concat(arcOrange)}},typography:{tab:{fontFamily:"Raleway!important",color:"white!important",textTransform:"none!important",fontWeight:"700!important",fontSize:"1rem!important"},estimate:{fontFamily:"pacifico!important",fontSize:"1rem!important",textTransform:"none!important"},h2:{fontFamily:"Relway",fontWeight:700,fontSize:"2.5rem",color:"".concat(arcBlue),lineHeight:1.5},h3:{fontFamily:"pacifico",fontSize:"2.5rem",color:"".concat(arcBlue)},h4:{fontFamily:"Relway",fontWeight:700,fontSize:"1.75rem",color:"".concat(arcBlue)},h6:{fontFamily:"Relway",fontWeight:500,color:arcBlue},subtitle1:{fontWeight:300,fontSize:"1.25rem",color:"".concat(arcGrey)},subtitle2:{fontWeight:300,fontSize:"1.25rem",color:"white"},body2:{fontSize:"1.25rem",color:arcGrey,fontWeight:300},caption:{fontSize:"1rem",fontWeight:300,color:arcGrey},learnBtn:{borderColor:arcBlue,color:arcBlue,borderWidth:2,textTransform:"none",borderRadius:50,fontFamily:"Roboto",fontWeight:"bold"}},breakpoints:{values:{xs:0,sm:706,md:925,mh:1280,lg:1280,xl:1536,cs:481,ccs:890,xss:500,bt:600}},components:{MuiInputLabel:{styleOverrides:{root:{color:arcBlue,fontSize:"1rem"}}},MuiInput:{styleOverrides:{root:{color:arcGrey,fontWeight:300},underline:{"&:before":{borderBottom:"2px solid ".concat(arcBlue)},"&:hover:before":{borderBottom:"2px solid ".concat(arcBlue,"!important")}}}}}});export default theme;
